body: It was super weird because it didn't have the tone to just suddenly break into buttsex like that. The lack of realism that would be acceptable in most doujins is too jarring when you're being so slow-paced and realistic up to that point. Bad action, at that, and then the relationship wasn't even good. Promising buildup, but a waste of time in the end
Five year age gap is pushing it

I feel like Sensei is gonna murder this guy at some point in the near future. By the way, if you'd actually like to see that, read the author's other work, Total Eclipse of the Eternal Heart. It's gr8
cute, a bit rapey, but then again its a fucking doujin

This is so gay
I like this
Is this a part of “Go for it NakuramaKun”? I might have butchered the title

Aunque entre los "tags" no ponen violación, bajo mi concepto la hubo, Souta-kun obligó a Hajime a dejarse penetrar bajándole los pantalones a la fuerza. No niego que hacia el final del acto sexual Hajime logró sentir placer y exteriorizarlo, y que algunos piensan ya que por ese motivo no hubo vilación, pero si la hubo. 

En general me ha encantado este doujin, el dibujo es de gran calidad, algo a lo que Syundei nos tiene acostumbrados. Disfruté mucho y me calenté bastante con la escenas de sexo. Esta mangaka tiene varias obras, algunas de comedia otras de misterio. Les recomiendo por ej. Ganbaré Nakamura-kun una dulce y cómica historia de amor.

Although among the "tags" there was no rape, in my opinion there was, Souta-kun forced Hajime to allow himself to be penetrated by forcing his pants down. I do not deny that towards the end of the sexual act Hajime managed to feel pleasure and externalize it, and that someone already thinks that for that reason there was no rape, but there
@ohnodonttell LOL I have to see that
My dick is confused but not as confused as me at the end since I don't get if the boy is happy or not.
Where's the rape part people are talking about? Change the student to girl and you've got your day to day shoujo manga plot here.
This like sum gayer side story of go for it Nakamura kun
Is this the manga that offended some retard on twitter and he made some post trying to cancel the author?
The art makes me nostalgic about the 80's, so it's great. But the rapee thing about the relationship isn't.
The art style reminds me of those 80's anime. 🙂
